name: resclient
description: Client implementation of the RES-Client Protocol.

scripts.clean: rimraf lib dist es coverage docs
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/rollup src/index.js --format umd --name resclient --sourcemap --output dist/resclient.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup src/index.js --format umd --name resclient --output dist/resclient.min.js
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run jest
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm test && npm run build
